summary: DT:  THE CONTACT STATED THREE UNIROYAL TIRES BLEW OUT. THE CAP BLEW OFF OF TWO. THE THIRD BLEWOUT.  BUT THE CAP DID NOT BLOW OFF. THE TIRES HAD 4,500 MILES ON THEM. UNIROYAL REPLACED ONE OF THE TIRES. THE TIRES BLEW OUT BETWEEN 8-5, 2005 AND 8-21.2005. THE CONSUMER HAD NOT NOTICED ANY BULGING IN THE TIRES. THESE WERE TIRES ON A 1994 HOLIDAY RAMBLER MOTOR HOME.  THE ROAD WAS A PAVED AND THE WEATHER WAS DRY. *AK  UNIROYAL LAREDO HD/H, LT235/85R16, TUBELESS E.  *NM
